backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types, state maps, authorization mixin usage, and core logic for users, products, carts, orders, coupons, referrals, and admin sessions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor data to the new schema, mainly updating user profile structure while preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence scores.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for numerous frontend files including routes, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables and dark-mode configuration for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document loading the frontend via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation outlining features, tech stack, and local development setup steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all customer and admin routes with layout and provider wrappers.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: UI for configuring Stripe, allowing admins to save a secret key and allowed countries with validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Renders a looping carousel of home page banner images.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Fetches and displays product categories in a grid with navigation, showing skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and outlet, showing a loading screen during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header containing navigation, search, theme/language toggles, cart count, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Skeleton-loading UI components for product cards, grids, category cards, and order rows.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays product details and image with add-to-cart functionality and stock status.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Renders a product image with fallback handling on missing or failed URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines react-query cache keys for products, categories, cart, orders, and Stripe config.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for fetching user role, admin status, and verifying admin tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Hooks to fetch cart/wishlist data and mutate cart items using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Hooks for fetching products and categories with auto-migration of sample products when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all available coupons via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Hooks to fetch customer orders and poll individual order status.
Fetches referral user IDs for the logged-in user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Provides React Query hooks to check and set Stripe configuration using user or admin actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin actor and exposes its loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state and login/logout helpers via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes to expose theme state, setter, and a dark-mode flag.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Implements a simple i18n system with English and Hindi translations and a context-based translation hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page listing available categories with basic loading state.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Admin page showing total available coupons with loading support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying static metrics for orders, revenue, and products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin layout handling token verification, logout, sidebar navigation, and nested routes.
Admin login form that authenticates via backend actor, stores a session token, handles errors, and redirects to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Placeholder page displaying a header and message for upcoming admin order management features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product list page with search, sorting, and product fetching using filters.
Placeholder page showing a basic layout for future admin user management.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, calculates subtotal, and links to checkout with login and loading states handled.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders product catalog with filters, search, category selection, price range, and sorting synced to URL parameters.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that validates login, displays cart and payment options, calculates totals, and simulates placing an order.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing banner, categories, and featured products with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays confirmation details for a completed order and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Displays a loggedâ€‘in user's order history with loading states, empty states, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Shows detailed information for a specific user order, including status, totals, and item list.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment failure message with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays successful payment status and links to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Product detail view with images, stock status, description, and add-to-cart/wishlist actions.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page indicating that address management features are coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Profile layout with tabs for overview, addresses, and settings, ensuring the user is authenticated.
Profile settings page allowing users to toggle dark mode and change language.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows user wishlist items or prompts login/empty state with product grid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including architecture notes, known issues, feature list, and the shift from Internet Identity to username/password admin login.
